example.ladino: Dicho sefaradi: Si el mal no era mío, me burlaría de mi vizino.
example.ladino_html: Dicho sefaradi: Si el mal no era mío, me burlaría de mi vizino.

example.english: I live with my father
example.ladino: Yo moro kon mi padre
example.ladino_html: Yo moro kon mi padre

example.english: I live with my mother

example.ladino_html: Yo moro kon mi madre

example.english: My father lives in Hungary

example.english: My mother lives in Bulgaria

example.english: In my family there are four people

example.english: You have to meet my family

example.english: David is my uncle. He is the brother of my mother.
example.ladino: David es mi tio. El es el ermano de mi madre.
example.ladino_html: David es mi tio. El es el ermano de mi madre.

example.english: Rachel is my aunt. She is the sister of my father.

example.english: Rina is my cousin. Her mother and my father are brothers.

example.english: Do you live alone? No, I live with my father.
example.ladino: Tu bives solo? No, yo bivo kon mi padre.
